column1: Smoque BBQ////With that friendly neighborhood greeting
column2: we walked into Smoque. It's nothing special to look at on the outside
column3: and not much better inside. There's a wall-covering blackboard with the menu
column4: but it's starting to fade out
column5: making it hard for noobs like us to decipher. Fortunately
column6: my brother is a regular here
column7: so I didn't need the menu.
